Introduction

Yoo Heedo is a South Korean rapper, singer, and actor under Futore Company. He is a member of the boy group B.I.G under GH Entertainment, with whom he made his official debut on July 9, 2014 with the release of their first single titled "Hello".

On April 10, 2018, he debuted with fellow member Gunmin in their group sub unit, Gunmin X Heedo, with the release of the single "Don't Worry".

In 2021, he took part in the co-ed project group Triple7 along his fellow members and girl group 3YE. They released the song "Presente" on August 10, 2021.

In 2017, he was a contestant on KBS2's survival show The Unit but was sadly eliminated in episode 14 after ranking 28th place.

On October 31, 2023, Yoo Heedo announced he has left GH Entertainment, however, he did not state if he was leaving B.I.G, therefore, until any official announcement, it is assumed he's still part of the group.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024. He was eliminated from the show in episode 8 after ranking 46th place.
